name: @mmmcorp/protractor-flake
description: A wrapper for protractor to automatically re-run failed specs for a specific number of attempts

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:integration: webdriver-manager update && npm run build && mocha test/helper.js test/integration/bin.js --slow 30000 --timeout 30000 --reporter tap
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post

author: Nick Tomlin
